meanings.definition: Ageists: People who discriminate against or have prejudice towards individuals based on their age.
meanings.sent1: Some ageists believe that older people are not capable of learning new things.
meanings.sent2: It is important to challenge ageists who discriminate against younger employees.
meanings.sent3: The ageists at the office were shocked when the elderly intern outperformed them all.
meanings.sent4: The ageists in society need to realize that age does not determine a person's worth.
meanings.sent5: The negative impact of ageists can be seen in the limited opportunities given to older job seekers.

meanings.definition: Ageists: Those who hold negative stereotypes or beliefs about people of a certain age group.
meanings.sent1: Some ageists assume that all teenagers are lazy and entitled.
meanings.sent2: We need to educate ourselves to avoid becoming ageists towards any age group.
meanings.sent3: The ageists at the party were surprised when the older guests were the life of the event.
meanings.sent4: Breaking free from ageists' views can lead to more inclusive and understanding communities.
meanings.sent5: The harm caused by ageists can perpetuate harmful biases and divisions in society.
